comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Certainly someone worthy of a Wikipedia entry... MISS WILSON HELD AS SPY IN GERMANY; Ambassador Gerard Obtains Release of Correspondent of a Chicago Newspaper. CURIOUS ON NAVAL AFFAIRS Set Free on Condition That She Leave the Empire Immediately -- Formerly Lived in Berlin. New York Times - Feb 13, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20E17F73E5C1373...
